actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 2687 of title 10, United States Code, to require notification of local officials, as well as Congress, before the closure, realignment, establishment, or expansion of a military installation may be carried out and to change the period of time which must elapse after notification before such action may be carried out.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Defense or the Secretary of the military department concerned, prior to the closure, realignment, establishment, or expansion of a military base, to inform local government officials in any area which would be directly affected by such action. Lengthens the period after notification to Congress before such action may take place.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 2687 of title 10, United States Code, to require notification of local officials, as well as Congress, before the closure, realignment, establishment, or expansion of a military installation may be carried out and to change the period of time which must elapse after notification before such action may be carried out.
